name: shema-app
description: ### SETUP:  - Install GIT https://git-scm.com/  - Install NODE JS https://nodejs.org/en/  - Right Click (In your project folder) -> Git Bash  - `git clone https://github.com/andrejhristovski/shema-app.git`  - In project Folder  - `npm install & npm start`  - Open in browser: localhost:4200
author: Andrej Hristovski
